title: It should not be possible to delte last core in admin ui
description: May it should not be possible to delete a core if only one core exists in the admin ui. If you delete the last core, solr of course throws an exception (cannot find solrconfig.xml). So I think it would be nice to disable the unload button in the web ui if only one core exists.

comments.author: Stefan Matheis (steffkes)
comments.content: I'd say this should be no longer needed, after SOLR-4943 is done.
